metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3962 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick where it did not properly sanitize certaininput before using it to invoke convert processes. This flaw allows anattacker to create a specially crafted image that leads to a use-after-freevulnerability when processed by ImageMagick. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to confidentiality, integrity, as well as systemavailability.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
